name: Stuck In Paradise
description:
This game is my entry for Ludum Dare 47 under the Jam section.

The game is pretty simple.  Once you enter the level, you just have to collect the crystals spread across the level to get out of the level. You don't die, you need not fight anyone, just find the crystal. If you can't, you'll just be stuck in the loop forever. 

Make sure you look everywhere for you never where the crystals are hidden.
Good Luck!

Controls: 

W: Jump

A: Move Right

S: Move Left

Note: The sound for the Windows export is a bit glitchy. I am trying to fix the issue though.
